body_html:
So maybe a general note in the docs mentioning the differences between CPU and GPU computations, and that results might be slightly different due to floating point arithmetics (non-associativity for example) or differences in algorithmic implementation?
Maybe in http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/cuda.html ?

body:
So maybe a general note in the docs mentioning the differences between CPU and GPU computations, and that results might be slightly different due to floating point arithmetics (non-associativity for example) or differences in algorithmic implementation?
Maybe in http://pytorch.org/docs/master/notes/cuda.html ?
